channel.title: Identity management on Ventus Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Identity management on Ventus Docs

item.title: Administrators
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to add a new Administrator to the Organization, how to Transfer the Organization to another User and how to Remove Administrator from the Organization in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Administrators page Add Administrator to the Organization Resend Invitation Delete Invitation Transfer Organization Remove Administrator from the Organization Administrators page NOTE: To see information about Administrators of the Organization and to manage them you can only if your User Role in this Organization is an Administrator or Owner.

item.title: Groups
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create and manage a new Group in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Group page Create Group Сonfigure Group Manage Users in Group Manage Projects in Group Edit Group Delete Group Groups page NOTE: Using Groups in Cloud Console you can add additional Users to the Project. To get to the Group page you need to select the Groups from the side-bar menu.
